Package com.soen343.smarthomesimulator.controllers

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.soen343.smarthomesimulator.controllers.HomeController
@RestController
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
Class HomeController

Controller for the Home component. Contains the endpoints that perform logic on the home entity.

  • Method Details

    • store

      @PostMapping("/home/store") public net.minidev.json.JSONObject store​(@RequestParam("name") java.lang.String name)
      POST endpoint to /home/store

      This endpoint creates a new Home entity and saves it to the database.

      Parameters:
      name - Defines the name of the home being saved.
      Returns:
      Response containing the operation's status.

    • update

      @PostMapping("/home/update") public net.minidev.json.JSONObject update​(@RequestParam("id") java.lang.Long id, @RequestParam(value="temperature",required=false) java.lang.Integer temperature, @RequestParam(value="date",required=false) java.sql.Timestamp date, @RequestParam(value="start_time",required=false) java.lang.Long startTime, @RequestParam(value="multiplier",required=false) java.lang.Integer multiplier, @RequestParam(value="security_level",required=false) java.lang.String securityLevel, @RequestParam(value="auto_mode",required=false) java.lang.Integer autoMode, @RequestParam(value="simulation_state",required=false) java.lang.Integer simulationState)
      Modify the parameters of a home / the context of the simulation
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the house to modify (Required)
      temperature - Temperature of the enviornment outside of the home
      date - the date and time the simulation is currently at
      startTime - Unix Epoch when the simulation was turned on
      multiplier - the speed at which time was moving
      securityLevel - the security level that the home should be set to
      autoMode - whether appliances like lights should automatically turn on when a user enters a zone in the home
      simulationState - State of the sumulation, 0/1 for off/on
      Returns:
      JSONObject
